TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataMemberConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子，可從目前元件的選取資料來源擷取資料成員清單。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data members from the current component's selected data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供方法，可以擷取從目前的資料來源的設計階段元件的資料成員的清單。 provides methods that can retrieve a list of data members from the current data source of a design-time component. 此型別轉換子正由[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供出現在清單中的資料成員屬性 視窗中的值。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data members in the Properties window. > [!CAUTION] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection
public: override System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter::StandardValuesCollection ^ GetStandardValues(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，表示要取得值的元件或控制項。

span.span: An object indicating the component or control to get values for.

summary.span: 當資料來源可取用時，取得該資料來源中的資料成員。

span.span: Gets the data members present within the selected data source, if information about them is available.

returns.span: ，列出針對元件所選的資料來源的資料成員。

span.span: A listing the data members of the data source selected for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用轉換器實作來擷取目前的資料來源選取範圍關聯的元件設計工具。The converter uses the implementation of the associated component's designer to retrieve the current data source selection.

span.span: An object that provides a format context.

summary.span: 取得值，表示 所傳回的標準值集合是否為所有可能值的清單。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from is a list of all possible values.

returns.span: 如果從 傳回的 是所有可能有效值的獨佔清單，則為 ，如果可能為其他的值，則為 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法永遠傳回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是獨占清單 (例如在列舉資料型別中)，則沒有其他有效值。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果清單不是獨占，則沒有其他有效值除了標準的清單值提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

para.span: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援標準值，請覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values.

para.span: 可以使用 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。

span.span: The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.

para.span: 它可能是，因此請務必檢查。

span.span: It might be , so you should always check.

para.span: 此外，屬性物件也可能會傳回。

span.span: Also, properties of the object might also return .
